BANNER_DATA.title:
Where Efficiency Meets 
 Student-Centric Admissions
BANNER_DATA.text: Admiti is the best software platform to review applications for your college. Implement a streamlined and holistic approach to access extensive student data and make informed decisions.

FEATURE_DATA.title: Holistic Decision-Making
FEATURE_DATA.text: Admitting the right students goes beyond mere academic scores. Analyze various facets of a student's profile like personal experiences and readiness to learn.

FEATURE_DATA.title: AI Chat Prompt Supported
FEATURE_DATA.text: Enjoy student profile summarization and data queries with natural language support and analysis. Use chat prompts to engage with applicant data.

FEATURE_DATA.title: Streamline Your Workflow
FEATURE_DATA.text: Automate repetitive processes, such as application review and annotations. Eliminate manual tasks and dedicate more time to engaging with applicants.

CUSTOMER_TRACKING.heading: Empower students with an open learning portfolio
CUSTOMER_TRACKING.content:
Unlock the power of student-centric education and enrich your application and advisement data. 
Enable students to take control of their personal learning, explore their passions, and reach their full potential.

SERVICE_DATA.title: Self-Directed Online Learning Development
SERVICE_DATA.content: Your students knowledge is ever evolving and expanding. Convert nearly any piece of online content into a verifiable learning experience.

SERVICE_DATA.title: Engage with Current & Prospective Students
SERVICE_DATA.content: Identify and connect with prospective applicants interested in your school or program.

SERVICE_DATA.title: Thriving Learning Community
SERVICE_DATA.content: Learning is a social experience, and our Student-Centric LXP fosters seamless collaboration and engagement.

SERVICE_DATA.title: Improve Retention
SERVICE_DATA.content: Understand your students academic readiness and engagement levels.

SERVICE_DATA.title: Advisement Tools
SERVICE_DATA.content: Dedicate more time to your students. Get insights on their passions, interests, and online learning.

SERVICE_DATA.title: Data-Driven Insights
SERVICE_DATA.content: Monitor milestones, track achievements, and identify areas for improvement with advanced analytics.

FEATURE_TWO_DATA.title: Smart Features
FEATURE_TWO_DATA.content: We want to find smart solutions and enhance your decision making process.

FEATURE_TWO_DATA.title: Secure Contents
FEATURE_TWO_DATA.content: We committed to data security and privacy (FERPA)

FAQ_DATA.title: Do you replace human readers or human decision making?
FAQ_DATA.description: While many universities already automate a part of their admission decisions, our software provides tools to empower informed human decision making. Our mission is to identify the students who are most likely to succeed.

FAQ_DATA.title: Does your software integrate with my existing system?
FAQ_DATA.description: Our API-accessible and bi-directional infrastructure provides a modern and robust foundation. Integration capability depends on the system architecture already in place. We can dive deeper into the possibilities and have a more detailed discussion with your CIO/CTO.

FAQ_DATA.title: What's the implementation and training process like?
FAQ_DATA.description: We view every relationship as a long-term partnership, and prefer to walk before we run. We'll define realistic timelines and milestones, design best practices that fit your admission process and strategic goals, and support your team through training and onboarding.
